name: Diablo 3 Active Stats Calculator
short_description:
Program that allows you to see your health, effective health, damage reduction from resistances, armor and total damage reduction! New feature now allows you to see your dps aswell! You can save certain setups so its easy to switch between a non-buffed setup and a buffed setup making it easy when in a group to check what upgrades are good for solo and which are good for the group you're in currently.!
Features to be added, any feed back is much appreciated please send it to rasmus.chr@hotmail.com thank you!
summary: Simple program to see stats for diablo 3.
